description: CAMERON, La. — Authorities say a Louisiana couple left their 1-year-old daughter alone on a beach while they went on a lengthy naked jog.
title: Sheriff: Naked jogging couple left infant alone on Louisiana beach
title_page: Sheriff: Naked jogging couple left infant alone on Louisiana beach
text:
CAMERON, La. — Authorities say a Louisiana couple left their 1-year-old daughter alone on a beach while they went on a lengthy naked jog.
According to KPLC-TV, Cameron Parish Sheriff Ron Johnson said his office received a report Tuesday morning of a 20-month-old child alone on Holly Beach. Deputies located the baby and then, about two hours later, found the baby's parents, Cody Bourgeois and Monique Bourgeois of Cameron Parish, jogging naked along the beach about 4 miles away.
The two adults were arrested and charged with child desertion and obscenity.
Johnson said he thinks the couple had been taking drugs.
Child Protective Services has been called to investigate.
It is unclear whether the parents have an attorney to comment on the charges.
